scripts.build:all: npm run build:kiosk && npm run build:patient && npm run build:receptionist && npm run build:tv && npm run build:functions
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix functions && npm install --prefix apps/kiosk && npm install --prefix apps/patient-registration && npm install --prefix apps/dashboard && npm install --prefix apps/tv-display
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:all && firebase deploy --only hosting
